column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We ordered the Pepperoni deep dish pizza
column2: and after 30-45 minutes it came out. It looked incredible. The service was excellent
column3: as they cut the pizza in front of you and then plate your food for you. I've had a lot of pizza from a ton of places
column4: but this was the best pizza I've ever had. The cheese stretched like it was straight out of a video. The sauce tasted amazing
column5: and the dough was as fresh as it gets.
